name: Dominate Will
description: Take control of an enemy minion nearby your General.

name: Shadow Nova
description: Create Shadow Creep tiles on a 2x2 area.

name: Bounded Lifeforce
description: Your General becomes 10/10.

name: Khymera
description: When this takes damage, summon a random token minion on a random nearby space.

name: Zurael, the Lifegiver
description:
Airdrop, Flying
Opening Gambit: Summon other allied minions that were destroyed since your last turn on random spaces.

name: Time Maelstrom
description: Take another turn after this one.
